item.title: WordPress Plugin: Batch Cat
item.author: 作者
item.description: Introduction Batch Cat is intended to help users change categories of posts in bulk. The main features are: Assign the selected categories to posts. Append the selected categories to posts. Delete the selected categories from posts. Intuitionistic operating manners which come up with people's common practice.
